| History                 = '''Talk 616!''' was a radio station located in [[Manhattan]]. When he was trying to get hold of [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] to alert him of a bank robbery, [[John Jonah Jameson (Earth-616)|J. Jonah Jameson]] stormed into the the station and interrupted a talk show to use its equipment to try to make the audience pass his message to Spider-Man. He began to argue with several callers, which prompted the radio host to give Jameson a segment. Jameson later asked his former rival [[Barney Bushkin (Earth-616)|Barney Bushkin]] to be his producer.{{r|Peter Parker: The Spectacular Spider-Man Annual Vol 1 1}} Jameson began to use his show, called ''Get to Work!'', to rectify his years of slander against Spider-Man.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 11}} This yielded mixed results, since the audience liked Jameson when he used to bash Spider-Man, prompting Jameson's bosses to cut his shift.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 13}}

| Trivia                  = * ''Get to Work!'' aired between 6:00 to 11:00 AM,{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 11}} but it was later cut to start at 10:00 AM.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 13}}
* Talk 616! is most likely named after [[Earth-616]], the former numeric designation of the Prime Marvel Universe.
